name: Ladida
tag_list: ikks, 3pommes, jean-bourget, tart, neige, splendid, ella-moss, anais--i, eva--oly, imps--elvs, ferd, cerc
overview: Ladida is a boutique based in New Jersey started in 2008. We offer a lovingly selected range of clothes, and accessories for babies and children up to the age of twelve. We have carefully selected a collection of designers from around the world that represent our sense of aesthetics and style. The brands on our site are all carefully chosen for a specific reason … they may be complementary to other brands, sometimes they are well-known brands, sometimes very edgy or quirky … our original vision has not changed because Ladida is here to respond to the fashion and design desires of all our customers: Marie Chantal, Jean Bourget, IKKS, Kico Kids, Essentiel- Belgium, Liho-LONDON, Imps & Elfs, Eva & Oli, Ferd, Ella Moss, Splendid, 3 pommes, Neige, C de C, Anais & I, Million Colors, Bang Bang Copenhagen, Petit Bateau, Babe & Tess, Louis Louise, Eliane et Lena, Little Paul & Joe, Bazaar De’Etoiles, Ada Ada, Tuss, Imoga, T-Bags EGG Baby, Go Gently Baby, Little Bean, Le Merchand D’Etoiles… and more!! We are always expanding and looking for the latest hottest brands! If you are looking for that “up to date look” Then you are in the right place! Ladida is about understated style and bold graphics, poetic and enchanting creations, simple and contemporary forms, soft and confortable fabrics, natural and organic materials, muted tones with accents of color, careful design and a hint of multicultural inspiration. Ladida is about creating a beautiful childhood. http://ladida.com/
